TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InputBin extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the input bin that is used as the source of blank paper or other print media.

span.span: Specifies the input bin that is used as the source of blank paper or other print media.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 유형의 값은 이러한 목적을 위해 주로 사용 됩니다.The values of this type are used primarily for these purposes: - 멤버로 합니다 의 속성, 컬렉션 , 프린터가 지 원하는 입력된 bin의 유형을 나타냅니다.As members of the collection, a property of , they indicate the types of input bins that the printer supports. - 값으로는 의 속성을 , 프린터에 지정 된 bin을 사용 하도록 지시 합니다.As the value of the property of a , they instruct the printer to use the specified bin. 알 수 없는 값의 속성에서 사용 되지 않습니다 개체입니다.The Unknown value is never used in properties of objects. 설정할 수 없습니다는 알 수 없는 속성입니다.You should never set a property to Unknown. 다른 경우 PrintTicket 문서가 입력된 함 기능을 인식할 수 없는 옵션을 설정 하는 응용 프로그램 생성 만들었습니다 (에서 정의 되지 않은 옵션 이므로 합니다 [인쇄 스키마](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)는 해당 문서를 사용 하 여 생성 된 응용 프로그램에서 개체의 값으로 알 수 없음이 적용 됩니다는 속성입니다.If some other producing application has created a PrintTicket document that sets the input bin feature to an unrecognized option, (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have Unknown as the value of the property. 하지만 합니다 및 클래스를 상속할 수 없습니다, 확장할 수 있습니다는 [인쇄 스키마](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) 에서 처리 하지 않은 인쇄 장치 기능을 인식 하는 또는 클래스.Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 자세한 내용은 [NOTINBUILD: 방법: 인쇄 스키마 및 새 인쇄 시스템 클래스 만들기 확장](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)합니다.For more information, see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 다음 예제에는 프린터 기능을 확인 하 고 활용 하도록 인쇄 작업을 구성 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following example shows how to determine printer capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

summary.span: The automatic selection of an input bin according to the page size and media output type.

span.span: The automatic selection of an input bin according to the page size and media output type.

summary.span: The automatic sheet feeder is used.

span.span: The automatic sheet feeder is used.

summary.span: A removable paper bin is used.

span.span: A removable paper bin is used.

summary.span: The manual input bin is used.

span.span: The manual input bin is used.

summary.span: A tractor feed (also called a pin feed) of continuous-feed paper is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.InputBin Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
